attributes.action: MAKE ALL RELIGIOUS GROUPS IN THEUNITED KINGDOM FOLLOW THE WELFARE OF ANIMALS (Slaughter or Killing) REGULATIONS 1995.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Kosher or Halal beliefs instruct Animals must not be stunned before having their throats slit. In England no animal can be slaughtered with out prior stunning, as stated in The Welfare of Animals (Slaughter or Killing) Regulations 1995.
The regulations do NOT say religious groups are exempt from these laws.
According to DEFRA "There are long-standing provisions in our law which permit the slaughter of animals without stunning to meet Jewish and Muslim religious requirements."
Secular animal slaughter involves pre-stunning animals so that they are unconscious before they are killed. 
I am calling for all groups and religions living in England to follow the slaughter guidelines as stated in The Welfare of Animals (Slaughter or Killing) Regulations 1995.  
I am calling for no person/s to be exempt from these regulations.
This is to protect our Britsh law and the influence it has over ALL people living in Britain, and,to protect Animals
